sample.title: String Walker Sample
sample.overview: StringWalker shows how to handle Unicode surrogate pairs and combining characters when walking a string. It provides a class, named StringWalker that wraps the StringInfo.ParseCombiningCharacters method and handles the complexity of having to deal with surrogates and combining characters.

buildsteps.step:
Type BUILD.bat from the command line.
C:\Program Files\Microsoft.NET\SDK\v1.1\Samples\Technologies\Localization\StringWalker\VB>Build.bat

runsteps.step:
Type StringWalker.exe from the command line.
C:\Program Files\Microsoft.NET\SDK\v1.1\Samples\Technologies\Localization\StringWalker\VB>StringWalker.exe
